sub_title: Digital Marketing Manager (SEM/SEO/Shopping) at Brilliant Earth
summary:
SEM focused Digital Marketer with experience in analyzing data, presenting to C-level leadership, and leveraging automation to drive rapid growth efficiently. 

In my spare time, I am also a trained singer with a passion for youth mentorship and making math accessible.
